org.apache.catalina.tribes.transport.bio.util
Class FastQueue

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.catalina.tribes.transport.bio.util.FastQueue

public class FastQueue
extends Object

A fast queue that remover thread lock the adder thread.
Limit the queue length when you have strange producer thread problems. FIXME add i18n support to log messages

Version:
$Id: FastQueue.java 1222856 2011-12-23 21:21:31Z markt $
Author:
Rainer Jung, Peter Rossbach
